ygData.messageBody:
What i wish to say is that if people go in arena, accept a duel or are
included in guild war then there is no need to have faction hit. this can
be also valid on PVP server so only if you hunt and kill unexpected people
like a bandit you are looked upon as a bandit. if you are a noble gentlmen
wich calls on duel then you dont have need to get a faction hit as your
oponent accepted a duel, or he goes with you in arena or he is member og
guild war and all is open game.
